reviewText: Danny Schechter, news dissector from WBCN " the American revolution" radio in activist Boston in the 70s , journalist , author and film maker, travelled America with Madiba on his American tour after his release from prison. Schechter, long time activist against segregation here and apartied in South Africa, had a front row seat to this historic celebration of justice. Watch and dance with Nelson as he smiles his way accross our country.
